body_content.explanation: one of many very small pieces of dried bread, especially used in cooking:
examples: Sprinkle the breadcrumbs over the mixture before baking.
Rub the flour and butter together until it has a breadcrumb consistency.

body_content.explanation: a piece of information, often separated from other similar information by the sign >, shown at the top of a website to help you find your way around the site by providing a link to the last page you looked at:
examples: Breadcrumbs come in handy to show a navigation trail for users clicking through a site.
You have to roll over a breadcrumb to see if it's an active link.
